summary: App draft with full-size image display; user reports uploaded image appears censored and requests reverting to the previous image.
known_issues: Full-size image display/upload appears censored; user requests replacing current image with the previous (revert).

existing_features.title: Update the homepage hero image to use the previous static asset (/assets/generated/phoenix-1988-image-3.dim_564x483.png) instead of the current one (/assets/generated/home-hero-replacement.dim_564x483.png). Keep the image dimensions at 564x483 and ensure the page renders without broken-image errors.

projectName: Revert homepage hero image to the previous asset
